de.ipk_gatersleben.bit.bi.bridge.brapicomp.dbentities

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ipk_gatersleben.bit.bi.bridge.brapicomp.dbentities.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    User - table model A user instance contains the information related to one user (username, email and apikey) It represents the "users" table.
